item.title: ðŸ’° Donations
item.description: Caution The content of this page has been entirely machine-translated into English, from Italiano. Therefore, it might contain any kind of errors. They told me I should make the site profit. In fact, if you think about it, they are right, but… there is a but. Since I cannot, for obvious reasons of human decency, put advertising, assorted trackers, or cryptominers on the site, I opt for something less invasive: this page.
